      • wrapCustomRoot

        static Supplier<?> wrapCustomRoot​(Object customRootInstance)
        Central wrapping method mosty to have a unified and concisely named location for the lambda.
        Parameters:
        customRootInstance - the instance to be used as the entity graph's root.
        Returns:
        a Supplier returning the passed customRootInstance instance.
